description technical detail:
NEC MultiSync E224Wi - 22" - LED-Backlit LCD Monitor
22" Eco-Friendly Widescreen Desktop Monitor w/ IPS Panel and LED Backlighting NEC's 22" MultiSync E224Wi uses a premium-grade IPS panel, which provides wide viewing angles, outstanding color consistency and image accuracy. It's LED backlighting technology allows a thinner, lighter and sleeker design, as well as higher power efficiency.
This EPEAT Silver model includes DisplayPort, DVI-D and VGA D-Sub inputs to connect you to the latest peripherals. Touch-sensitive controls enable simple display adjustments through the E224Wi?s On Screen Display (OSD).
Enjoy full ergonomic flexibility with height adjustment, tilt, swivel and portrait adjustability.- IPS active matrix LCD provides superior screen performance, including wide viewing angles and lifelike flesh tones- LED backlight technology provides for industry-leading low power consumption and less hazardous materials- 4-way ergonomic design (height-adjust, pivot, tilt & swivel) enhances your viewing comfort- VGA, DVI-D and DisplayPort inputs provide expanded connectivity with advanced technology- EPEAT Silver complianceXtraView+Delivers wide viewing angles of up to 178Âº horizontally and vertically (up to 89Âº up, down, left and right) with less color shift and without any glare, reflection or distortion.No Touch Auto AdjustAllows the monitor to be automatically adjusted to optimal image settings when initially turned on.
LED Backlight Provides for industry-leading low power consumption and less hazardous materials. Carbon Footprint Metre Informs and motivates responsible use of the display by calculating and tracking the conservation of green gas emissions in real time. Ambix3 Allows up to three inputs (VGA, DVI-I and DVI-D) to be connected to a single monitor and for each of the three signals to be displayed with the press of a button.
